name: Login form integration with Recaptcha V2
author: Rajat Meshram

sections.description:
Adding Google Recaptcha V2 in Login Form helps to protect against bot attacks, prevent account takeover, and guard against fraudulent activities. The use of this reCAPTCHA plugin in login forms enhances security and user experience by protecting user accounts and sensitive information from automated attacks.

This plugin integrates Google reCAPTCHA v2 on the WordPress login form. When enabled, it adds a reCAPTCHA challenge that users must complete to log in, thereby preventing automated login attempts.

Third-Party Services

This plugin uses Google reCAPTCHA for validating login attempts. Data is sent to the Google reCAPTCHA service for verification.

  • Google reCAPTCHA
  • Google reCAPTCHA Terms of Service
  • Google reCAPTCHA Privacy Policy
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin.
  2. Upload and install the plugin.
  3. Create Site and Secret keys from Google here.
  4. Add the keys to the plugin settings.
  5. Click on save.

In case you find difficulties in setting up your plugin, feel free to write an email to support@rajatmeshram.in.
